devdoc.author: Victor Ose Iyayi
devdoc.details: This contract demonstrates basic crowdfunding functionality and includes      security measures such as an owner-only withdrawal function. It uses      the Chainlink ETH/USD price feed to ensure contributions meet a minimum      USD value.

constructor.details: Sets the contract owner and initializes the price feed.

params.priceFeedAddress: The address of the Chainlink ETH/USD price feed.

fund().details: Requires that the contribution, converted to USD, is greater than or      equal to the minimum USD amount. Adds the funder's address to the      `funders` array and updates their contribution amount in the      `addressToAmountFunded` mapping.

withdraw().details: Only the contract owner can call this function. It resets the      `funders` array and the `addressToAmountFunded` mapping. It uses      `call` to transfer the funds to the owner.

devdoc.title: FundMe

MINIMUM_USD().notice: The minimum contribution amount in USD (60 USD).

addressToAmountFunded(address).notice: A mapping of addresses to the amount of ETH they have contributed.

fund().notice: Allows users to contribute ETH to the contract.

funders(uint256).notice: An array of addresses that have contributed to the contract.

withdraw().notice: Allows the contract owner to withdraw all funds.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows users to contribute ETH to a crowdfunding campaign,         with a minimum contribution amount in USD. It uses a Chainlink Price Feed         on the Sepolia Testnet for ETH/USD conversion.
